body:
Hello, everyone, this is the public release of the first chapter, like I said chapter 2 is already being translated.

And also (C95) [PYPYworks (Syamonabe)] Gomenne Lillie (Pokémon Sun and Moon) It’s one of the more hardcore chapters featuring Sun and his harem of Alolan Pokegirls. It looked like a fun project I could do in tandem with this one, has always daily Updates on my Patreon and Subscribe Star.

Hope you liked the Chapter and keep enjoying my work.
